about.title: About me
about.content: I have been passionate about web development for two years now. My professional journey has led me to specialize primarily in front-end, where I have developed a strong skill in creating attractive and functional user interfaces. However, my projects have also led me to actively explore the backend domain. In addition to web development, I am passionate about sports, especially basketball, and cinema. This occupies a significant portion of my time outside of web development. Currently, I am in an apprenticeship at
